verses.name: Romans 4:1
verses.text: What shall we say then that Abraham our father, as pertaining to the flesh, hath found?

verses.name: Romans 4:2
verses.text: For if Abraham were justified by works, he hath whereof to glory; but not before God.

verses.name: Romans 4:3
verses.text: For what saith the scripture? Abraham believed God, and it was counted unto him for righteousness.

verses.name: Romans 4:4
verses.text: Now to him that worketh is the reward not reckoned of grace, but of debt.

verses.name: Romans 4:5
verses.text: But to him that worketh not, but believeth on him that justifieth the ungodly, his faith is counted for righteousness.

verses.name: Romans 4:6
verses.text: Even as David also describeth the blessedness of the man, unto whom God imputeth righteousness without works,
